Job Description We are looking for a creative and experienced Art Director to join the HP team who will be responsible for developing and executing global retail marketing programs and creating market-specific initiatives. As the Art Director, you will collaborate with other creatives along with strategy, and business leadership to ensure that all creative meet each brief's objectives and are consistent with the brand. Key Responsibilities: Concept and develop global retail marketing programs, including but not limited to key visual, visual merchandising, in-store displays, product packaging, creative sell-in decks, in-lines, endcaps, table tents, and shelf strips. Create market-specific programs that cater to different regions and local audiences' unique needs. Oversee the design and production of all assets, ensuring they are visually stunning, effective, and consistent with the brand. Should have some experience developing digital, print, and social media assets. Stay up to date with the latest design trends and technologies Qualifications 3+ years of experience in art direction, preferably in a global retail marketing or agency setting. Strong portfolio demonstrating exceptional design skills and a deep understanding of branding and marketing principles. Proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, including Photoshop, Illustrator, and InDesign. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively with cross-functional teams. Strong leadership skills Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously and prioritize workload to meet tight deadlines. Demonstrated success in developing and executing successful global retail marketing and market-specific programs. Additional Information The Power of One starts with our people!
